Job Title: Purchasing Manager

Location: Roxboro, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing, Purchasing

Description:
Overview:We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Purchasing Manager to join our team. As a Purchasing Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the procurement process, managing suppliers, and ensuring the efficient flow of goods and services. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in procurement management and possess excellent negotiation and communication skills.
Responsibilities:- Develop and implement procurement strategies to optimize cost savings and improve efficiency- Source and evaluate suppliers based on quality, price, and delivery capabilities- Negotiate contracts and terms with suppliers to ensure favorable pricing and terms- Manage supplier relationships, including performance evaluations and ongoing communication- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of purchasing activities with business objectives- Monitor inventory levels and implement inventory control measures to minimize stockouts and excess inventory- Oversee logistics activities, including transportation, customs clearance, and warehousing- Utilize Oracle EBS or similar systems to track purchasing activities and maintain accurate records- Stay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and new product developments- Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements
Skills:- Proven experience in procurement management, preferably in a similar industry- Strong knowledge of supply chain management principles and practices- Proficiency in using Oracle EBS or similar procurement systems- Excellent negotiation skills with the ability to secure favorable terms with suppliers- Solid understanding of contract management and legal requirements- Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze data and make informed decisions- Effective communication skills to collaborate with internal stakeholders and external suppliers- Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environmentJoin our team as a Purchasing Manager and contribute to our success by optimizing our procurement processes, managing supplier relationships, and ensuring the timely delivery of goods and services. We offer competitive compensation packages and opportunities for professional growth.Note: Please do not include any contact information such as email or phone number in the job description.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
